sources.title: The Healer (1935)
sources.description: A young doctor running a health farm for polio victims is dazzled by a pretty and wealthy society girl, to the detriment of his patients and the woman who really loves him. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-healer-1935/

metadata.Plot: A young doctor running a health farm for polio victims is dazzled by a pretty and wealthy society girl, to the detriment of his patients and the woman who really loves him.
metadata.Writer: John F. Goodrich, Robert Herrick, James Knox Millen
metadata.Actors: Ralph Bellamy, Karen Morley, Mickey Rooney
